visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column chart with the title 'Non-reversed stacks demo. First series is in bottom.' The x-axis should have categories for each month of the year. The chart should stack the series normally, and the y-axis should not reverse the stacks. The data series should include four sets of monthly data. The tooltip should display the series name, the point value, and the percentage of the total.

title.text: Non-reversed stacks demo. First series is in bottom.

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts configuration object is designed to render a column chart with stacked series. The chart type is set to 'column', and the title is 'Non-reversed stacks demo. First series is in bottom.' The x-axis is categorized by months, and the y-axis does not reverse the stacks, maintaining the normal stacking order. The data series include four sets of monthly data, each with varying values. The tooltip is configured to display the series name, the point value, and the percentage of the total, providing detailed information when hovering over the data points. This setup ensures a clear and informative visualization of the data.
